page.title: 08A TYPICAL DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
I get up at 7.30, wash, get changed and have breakfast. We leave for school at 8.45 and get there at 8.50. I start school at 9.00. We have playtime at 10.30. School dinners are at 12.00. In between ,we do Maths, Drawing or English. After dinner we have playtime, then at 1.15pm we go back in class and start work again. Sometimes we do sports, football or rounders. At 3.30 we go home. At home I watch the TV and play with the music centre or my dad's C.B.radio. Often, I play outside with Simon my brother,usually football in the winter or cricket in the summer. I have tea, play and then I go to bed at about nine O'clock.
By Matthew Harris (11) representative of pupils at Otterton Primary School.
